name: Kanga's Gone! The Beginning
description:
A terror has come over the land...Kanga's Gone! Jump into action as Spring, a mother kangaroo whose baby, Kanga, has left Australia and ran away. Collect water in your pouch and grow plants to reach new heights and save Kanga!

Note: you will see odd graphics, few levels, no sound etc. Ran out of time, but I hope you enjoy it as is.
